Uses of Package
hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble

  • Packages that use hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble 
    Package Description
    hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble
    Package containing classes related to the controller of the MVC pattern.
    hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.model
    Package containing the model classes of the MVC pattern.
    hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.view
    Package containing the classes associated with the view of the MVC pattern.
  • Classes in hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble used by hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble 
    Class and Description
    Bag
    The Bag class represents the bag from which the players can draw tiles during the game.
    Computer
    The Computer class represents the computer as a player.
    ConnectionFactory 
    Dictionary 
    DictWord
    Note: this class has a natural ordering that is inconsistent with equals.
    ExistingUserException 
    Field
    The Field class represents a field of the game board.
    Field.Multiplier
    The possible point multipliers a field can give.
    Field.Status
    The possible statuses of a field in a turn.
    Gameboard 
    GameState
    Class for holding informations about the state of the game.
    NoSavedGameException 
    Player
    The Player class represents a human player.
    SavedGameDAO 
    Tray
    The Tray class represents the tray in the game, on which a player places his/her letter tiles drawn from the bag.
    UserDAO 
  • Classes in hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble used by hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.model 
    Class and Description
    Field
    The Field class represents a field of the game board.
  • Classes in hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble used by hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.view 
    Class and Description
    Computer
    The Computer class represents the computer as a player.
    Controller
    The Controller class represents the controller of the MVC pattern.
    Dictionary 
    Gameboard 
    GameState
    Class for holding informations about the state of the game.
    GameView
    An interface defining common services a view class for the game should provide.
